verses.verse: I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> that, <S%G4412>first<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1162>supplications,<s%> <S%G4335>prayers,<s%> <S%G1783>intercessions,<s%> and giving of <S%G2169>thanks,<s%> be <S%G4160>made<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men;<s%>

For <S%G935>kings,<s%> and for <S%G3956>all<s%> that are in <S%G5247>authority;<s%> that we may <S%G1236>lead<s%> a <S%G2263>quiet<s%> and <S%G2272>peaceable<s%> <S%G979>life<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> and <S%G4587>honesty.<s%>
For <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%> and <S%G587>acceptable<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior;<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> have <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> and to <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>
For there is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3316>mediator<s%> between <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G444>men,<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>

<S%G1519>Whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G5087>ordained<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher,<s%> and an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G5574>lie<s%> not;) a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G225>verity.<s%>

In <S%G5615>like<s%> manner <S%G2532>also,<s%> that <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2885>adorn<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> in <S%G2887>modest<s%> <S%G2689>apparel,<s%> with <S%G127>modesty<s%> and <S%G4997>sobriety;<s%> not with <S%G4117>braided<s%> <S%G4117>hair,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3135>pearls,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4185>costly<s%> <S%G2441>array;<s%>
But I <S%G2010>suffer<s%> not a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to <S%G1321>teach,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> to <S%G831>usurp<s%> <S%G831>authority<s%> over the <S%G435>man,<s%> but to be in <S%G2271>silence.<s%>
And <S%G76>Adam<s%> was not <S%G538>deceived,<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman<s%> being <S%G538>deceived<s%> was in the <S%G3847>transgression.<s%>

Notwithstanding she shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> in <S%G5042>childbearing,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G3306>continue<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>charity<s%> and <S%G38>holiness<s%> with <S%G4997>sobriety.<s%>
